Makes sense, as much as I like the services that Steam provides I see that not everyone uses that, and it will be more relevant now that GOG has announced that they will be selling KSP as well.

So now I speculate that the new feature will be a new UI element that lists all of the parts on a craft (available both in the VAB/SPH and in flight) to aid in selecting parts with weird meshes that are impossible to select once placed and when your craft is spinning wildly and you need to access the right click menu for a part.
